name: multi-platform-publisher
description: Write once, publish everywhere - Automated article publishing to Zenn, Qiita, and Dev.to

scripts.publish:dry: echo '🧪 Dry run mode - no actual publishing' && npm run convert
scripts.preview:qiita: npm run convert && npx qiita preview --root qiita --config config/qiita.config.json
scripts.convert:qiita: node -e "const {getPublishedArticles, convertToQiita} = require('./scripts/convert-articles'); console.log('Qiita変換のみ実行...');"
scripts.convert:devto: node -e "const {getPublishedArticles, convertToDevTo} = require('./scripts/convert-articles'); console.log('Dev.to変換のみ実行...');"

author: pipipi-dev
